thread.title: Study puts Puerto Rico hurricane deaths at 4,645

title: Study puts Puerto Rico hurricane deaths at 4,645
text:
Study puts Puerto Rico hurricane deaths at 4,645 6:38am BST - 01:49
A Harvard University study published Tuesday estimated at least 4,645 people died in Puerto Rico as a result of Hurricane Maria last fall, seventy times the official death toll of 64. Zachary Goelman reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A Harvard University study published Tuesday estimated at least 4,645 people died in Puerto Rico as a result of Hurricane Maria last fall, seventy times the official death toll of 64. Zachary Goelman reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IYC5jN
